Walking Aid: A walking aid such as a cane or walker would provide support and stability while moving around.
Standing Frame: A standing frame is a piece of equipment that helps individuals stand up and move around while seated.
Transfer Board: A transfer board can be used to transfer from a wheelchair to a standing position or vice versa.
Powered Mobility Scooter: A powered mobility scooter can be used to move around with ease, providing a motorized alternative to a wheelchair.
Adaptive Sports Equipment: Adaptive sports equipment, such as a handcycle or sit-skis, can be used to participate in sports and recreational activities.
